snippet: The German police said they had arrested four men, and the federal authorities banned three associations linked to the Salafi movement.
abstract: German police arrest four men associated with ultraconservative Islamic Salafism movement on suspicion of plot to kill leader of far-right political party that has taunted Muslims; arrests come as federal authorities ban three associations linked to same movement in country.
lead_paragraph: The German police said they had arrested four men, and the federal authorities banned three associations linked to the Salafi movement.

headline.main: Germany Cracks Down on Islamic Extremism
